question_text:
Question 41. 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
MCQ (1M)
Question ID : 8232513103
Consider the following ANSI C program:

PAGE
29

int main  ( ) {
Integer x;
Return 0;
}
which one of the following phases in a 7- phase C compiler will throw an error?
(A) Lexical analyzer  
 
 
(B) Semantic analyzer
(C) Machine dependent optimizer  
(D) Syntax analyzer
explanation_text:
Sol. 
It is syntax error. As per ANSI C integer is not keyword for declaration of integer.
We have int.
